overview.base: You count as being undead for the purposes of abilities, damage, and other effects. You also gain Ethereal Senses, Healing Sensitivity, Impure Durability, Mana Drain Grasp, Undead Mind, and Undying Durability.

results.hit: Deal [[/roll 1d6[magic fire]]] damage to target.
results.critHit: Double the damage dice dealt by this ability.

system.heightened: For each additional MP spent, deal an additional [[/roll 1d6[magic fire]]] damage.

results.hit: Deal [[/roll 1d10[fire magic]]] damage to target.
results.critHit: Double the damage dice dealt by this ability.

system.heightened: For each additional MP spent, deal an additional [[/roll 1d10[fire magic]]] damage.

overview.base: When you attack with Flame Ray or Fire Ball, you may target an additional creature or the same creature twice. Any costs you pay must be paid twice and be the same for both attacks These incur attack penalties as though they were two separate attacks.
overview.fluent: You may instead choose up to 1 + F additional or repeated targets.

overview.base: Pick a class of weapons. These weapons are AV0 for you. You may change which class of weapons you choose during a long rest. Whenever you attempt a single action weapon attack with a weapon of the chosen class, you may trigger a single action non-attack basic ability as a free reaction as well.
overview.proficient: You may also trigger single action non-attack Assassin abilities as free reactions in this way.

overview.base: At the start of each of your turns, you heal and regain that many HP. This does not consume your hit die. If you take fire damage, this effect doesn't apply on your next turn.
You can see and hear spirits and Ethereal creatures.

Healing can be used to damage you. If the creature providing you healing specifies that they are doing so "for damage" then you roll your largest hit die and take that much holy damage instead of the normal healing effect. This does not consume any of your hit dice.
You are immune to non-magic non-silver damage.

results.hit: Deal [[/roll 1d8[mana]]] drain to the target. If this kills the target, you revitalize.
results.critHit: Deal [[/roll 2d8[mana]]] drain to the target. If this kills the target, you revitalize twice.

overview.base: You are immune to being frightened or charmed.

You are immune to unconsciousness, suffocating, and being poisoned. You do not drop due to being at negative HP. You still die when you reach half your maximum HP below zero. You also do not have to breathe.
